mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR (PKID, CASE_CODE, SRV_CODE,SRV_CAT PROCESSOR_ID, ORG_ID,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srvCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID})

PKID,
CASE_CODE,
SRV_CODE,
SRV_CAT,
PROCESSOR_ID,
ORG_ID,
CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY,

#{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srvCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID},
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRV_CODE = #{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRV_CAT = #{srvCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESSOR_ID = #{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY=@{SESSION_USER_ID},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT};

PKID,
CASE_CODE,
SRV_CODE,
SRV_CAT,
PRE_PROCESSOR_ID,
PRE_ORG_ID,
PROCESSOR_ID,
ORG_ID,
CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,CREATE_BY,UPDATE_BY,

#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{srvCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{preProcessorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{preOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GETDATE(),GETDATE(),@{SESSION_USER_ID},@{SESSION_USER_ID}
; select 1;

update sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR
SRV_CODE = #{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRV_CAT = #{srvCat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESSOR_ID = #{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY=@{SESSION_USER_ID},
where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PROCESSOR_ID =#{preProcessorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

mapper.select: select distinct CASE_CODE AS caseCode from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where PROCESSOR_ID = #{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SRV_CODE AS srvCode from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select distinct SRV_CAT AS srvCat from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by srvCat
SELECT FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (PROCESSOR_ID !=#{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or PROCESSOR_ID is null)
mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR set PROCESSOR_ID=#{processorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ID=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , UPDATE_TIME=GETDATE(),UPDATE_BY=@{SESSION_USER_ID} where SRV_CODE=#{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

mapper.select: SELECT PROCESSOR_ID, ORG_ID FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where case_code=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and srv_code=#{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT PROCESSOR_ID, ORG_ID , (select u.USERNAME from sctrans.SYS_USER u where u.ID=PROCESSOR_ID) srvName FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where case_code=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and srv_code=#{srvCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SRV_CODE in('3000401001','3000401002','3000400201','3000400101')
delete from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and SRV_CODE in('3000400201','3000400101');
mapper.select: select count(*) cu from sctrans.T_TO_ATTACHMENT t where t.PART_CODE='LoanlostApply' and t.PRE_FILE_CODE='loan_lost_letter' and t.AVAILABLE='Y' and t.CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select count(t.TASK_DEF_KEY_) cu from sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST t inner join sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW w on t.PROC_INST_ID_=w.INST_CODE where t.TASK_DEF_KEY_='LoanlostApply' and w.CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) cu from sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE m where m.IS_ACTIVE=1 and m.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=0 and m.CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
